name: SFFECO
description:
SFFECO (Saudi Factory for Fire Equipment Co.), an ISO 9001 certified manufacturing company by BRE Global, is a market leader and specialize in manufacturing of fire-fighting equipment in the world. Headquartered in Riyadh-KSA, SFFECO has a long standing established reputation for pioneering innovation ever since its foundation in 1983. It has its state-of-the-art manufacturing plant producing end-end range of products for the fire fighting industry matching international standards in quality in KSA and UAE. It is represented in globally in over 100 countries worldwide with its highly knit distributor and dealer network. 

•	EN3 Fire Extinguishers (largest range in the world) with CE and Kitemark
•	UL Listed HFC227ea clean agent fire suppression system – SFFECO-227
•	UL Listed Fire Pumps
•	UL / ULC Fire Doors
•	UL / FM Dry Barrel Fire Hydrants and Standard Wet Barrel Fire Hydrants
•	KitchenHood Systems
•	EN671 Standards approved Fire Hose Reels
•	EN694 approved Semi Rigid Hose
•	UL Listed Fire Hose Reel Cabinets
•	UL Foam Liquid Concentrates and Foam Equipment Systems
•	UL Listed Fire Alarm System and Equipment
•	UL Listed Sprinklers & Water Spray System
•	BSI Kitemark Landing Valves and Riser Equipments
•	Water/Foam Deluge System
•	Custom-made specialized units like BacPac portable water mist system, hose reel stations, trailers etc.

company_updates.description:
✔ Durable
✔ Flexible
✔ Reliable

SFFECO Single & Double Jacket Fire Hoses are UL Listed, abrasion-resistant & built to withstand the toughest conditions. 

https://lnkd.in/ei4pj48

SFFECO Road Runner – a rapid-response firefighting vehicle with an advanced water mist system that stops fires fast.


✅ Goes where big trucks can’t
✅ Attacks fires in seconds
✅ Built tough on a 4×4 chassis


Details: https://lnkd.in/dv9dpSCf

Speed. Safety. Power. Anywhere.
#SFFECO #RoadRunner #FireSafety #WaterMist #RapidResponse

When every second counts, trust SFFECO’s EN 671-1 Certified Fire Hose Reels for reliable and rapid response. Manufactured at our state-of-the-art facility in Riyadh, these hose reels combine robust construction, smooth operation, and modern aesthetics—perfect for commercial, residential, and industrial use. With manual and automatic options, flexible mounting configurations, and certified high-performance hoses, SFFECO ensures your fire safety systems are always ready when it matters most.
 
#SFFECO #FireSafety #HoseReel #EN6711 #MadeInSaudi #CivilDefense #BuiltToProtect #EmergencyPreparedness

Details: https://lnkd.in/ei4pj48

SFFECO Hose Reel with Jockey Cabinets are designed to deliver fast access and maximum protection for firefighting equipment when it matters most. Built tough to withstand harsh conditions—rain, sandstorms, and UV rays—they keep your hose reels and pumps secure, corrosion-free, and ready for action. Custom-built to suit your specific needs, our cabinets combine durability, safety, and ease of use in one compact solution.

#SFFECO #FireProtection #HoseReelCabinet #PumpCabinet #FireSafety #MadeInSaudi #EmergencyReady

For more details: https://lnkd.in/dAvKUNaS

SFFECO Foam/Water Cabinet – Model SF9000 is your first line of defense against Class A & B fires. Designed for high-risk environments like gas stations, petrochemical sites, and warehouses, it delivers powerful suppression within seconds. Built from durable steel or stainless steel with a sloped roof and safe, folded edges, it’s powder-coated and oven-baked at 200°C for long-lasting protection against rust and wear.

For more details: https://lnkd.in/dAz9rS6b

#SFFECO #FireSafety #FoamCabinet #ClassAFire #ClassBFire #EmergencyResponse #MadeInSaudi #IndustrialSafety

SFFECO’s Semi-Rigid Fire Fighting Hoses are built for performance and reliability. Fully compliant with BS EN 694:2014, these hoses are ideal for commercial, industrial, and residential firefighting systems. With a rugged double-layered PVC design, high pressure resistance up to 42 bar, and sizes available in 19mm and 25mm, they’re engineered to perform—even in the toughest conditions.

·        Complies with BS EN 694:2014 standard
·        Locally manufactured in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia
·        Double-layered PVC construction (red cover, black lining)
·        High tensile polyester reinforcement
·        Withstands pressures up to 42 bar
·        Suitable for fire hose reels and fixed systems

For more details: https://lnkd.in/ei4pj48

Now in stock and ready for immediate delivery – the SFFECO Hawk Series 1 RIV1 offers a compact, high-performance solution for rapid emergency response.
 
- Ford chassis 
- SS Water & Foam Tanks 
- High-Capacity Pump
- Since 1983, trusted fire safety solutions.

#FireSafety #RIV #SFFECO #EmergencyResponse #RapidIntervention #NowInStock

https://lnkd.in/dKd3fQQz

SFFECO proudly introduces its latest line of UL Listed Dry Powder and CO₂ Fire Extinguishers, engineered to deliver unmatched reliability and rapid response in critical moments. Compliant with global safety standards, these extinguishers are designed to tackle Class A, B, and C fires, making them perfect for industrial, commercial, and residential environments. With durable construction, user-friendly design, and proven performance, SFFECO ensures you're always equipped to protect lives, property, and assets.

Details: https://lnkd.in/dzgJ3hsd

#SFFECO #ULListed #FireSafety #FireExtinguishers #SafetyFirst

Trailer mounted monitors are a mobile firefighting platform capable of large volume discharge to elevations difficult to attain by conventional equipment. 

SFFECO Trailer mounted monitors are designed specifically for mobile and land based firefighting, offering a flow range of 300 GPM to 22,000 GPM of water or foam extinguishing solution. This unit is compact, sturdy, and require minimal maintenance. All major manufacturing processes carried out in our Saudi Arabian factory, and we conduct thorough testing there as well. The platform provides the operator the freedom of smooth, rapid horizontal and vertical movement and the articulation of maximum 360˚, making this trailer a superior weapon in fighting large scale industrial fires and mitigating other extremely challenging hazards.  The integrated nozzle on the Trailer mounted monitor has the capability to perform as an automatic pressure or fixed flow nozzle.

The unit is designed along with a special waterway to provide minimum friction loss, maximum efficiency, and reliable service. Various combinations of inlet sizes are available to provide maximum connectivity.   Different types and capacities of monitors are available as well as the operations are user friendly. Dual gear operated monitor can be easily and safely controlled by a firefighter for pan and tilt. Remote controlled monitors are also available which will help the fire fighter to control water streams from a distant location. Four point trailer jacks ensure stability during operation. Trailer mounted monitor unit can be included with a tool box and a foam proportioning package.

Please visit: www.sffeco.com

SFFECO STANDPIPE SYSTEMS for fast and reliable fire response.
Landing Valves, Breaching Inlets & Cabinets – Built tough, tested hard, and ready when every second counts. 

Visit: www.sffeco.com

 #FireSafety #SFFECO #LandingValves

SFFECO Fire Equipment Maintenance Services

At SFFECO, our Maintenance Division provides periodic servicing for all types of fire alarm and firefighting systems — whether installed by us or others.

✅ Professional, rapid-response team
✅ Latest technology & reliable solutions
✅ Commitment to quality & customer trust
✅ Always ready for emergencies

With SFFECO, you can trust that your fire systems will remain fully operational when it matters most.

Visit: www.sffeco.com

SFFECO proudly introduces its latest line of UL Listed Dry Powder and CO₂ Fire Extinguishers, engineered to deliver unmatched reliability and rapid response in critical moments. Compliant with global safety standards, these extinguishers are designed to tackle Class A, B, and C fires, making them perfect for industrial, commercial, and residential environments. With durable construction, user-friendly design, and proven performance, SFFECO ensures you're always equipped to protect lives, property, and assets.

Details: https://lnkd.in/dzgJ3hsd

#SFFECO #ULListed #FireSafety #FireExtinguishers #SafetyFirst

Trailer mounted monitors are a mobile firefighting platform capable of large volume discharge to elevations difficult to attain by conventional equipment. 

SFFECO Trailer mounted monitors are designed specifically for mobile and land based firefighting, offering a flow range of 300 GPM to 22,000 GPM of water or foam extinguishing solution. This unit is compact, sturdy, and require minimal maintenance. All major manufacturing processes carried out in our Saudi Arabian factory, and we conduct thorough testing there as well. The platform provides the operator the freedom of smooth, rapid horizontal and vertical movement and the articulation of maximum 360˚, making this trailer a superior weapon in fighting large scale industrial fires and mitigating other extremely challenging hazards.  The integrated nozzle on the Trailer mounted monitor has the capability to perform as an automatic pressure or fixed flow nozzle.

The unit is designed along with a special waterway to provide minimum friction loss, maximum efficiency, and reliable service. Various combinations of inlet sizes are available to provide maximum connectivity.   Different types and capacities of monitors are available as well as the operations are user friendly. Dual gear operated monitor can be easily and safely controlled by a firefighter for pan and tilt. Remote controlled monitors are also available which will help the fire fighter to control water streams from a distant location. Four point trailer jacks ensure stability during operation. Trailer mounted monitor unit can be included with a tool box and a foam proportioning package.

Please visit: www.sffeco.com

The doors and frames are manufactured in a totally automated plant which employs computer numerical controlled (CNC) machines which ensures uniform quality and better finish. 

The fire doors and frames are manufactured at a state of the art facility.  
SFFECO has an expertise to manufacture a wide range of fire doors and frames to meet the specific requirements.  
These doors are designed for areas where strength, stability and durability are a priority. 
SFFECO will provide fire rated doors and frames in compliance with ANSI / NFPA80, CAN4-S104, UL 10B, UL 10C and UBC 7-2(1997).

Ensure Your Safety with Professional Fire Equipment Maintenance!

SFFECO’s after sales service ensures optimum customer satisfaction through our rapid action and work quality.  We always target to deliver latest technology to our clients.  SFFECO Maintenance division is one of the most important and active division of SFFECO, wherein this division carries out periodically maintenance services for all types of fire alarm systems and firefighting systems which are imported and installed by SFFECO or by another company.

SFFECO Maintenance Division has an integrated work team and that is to guarantee our competence and credibility, to achieve the highest level of quality and to keep our trust relationship with clients. Therefore, we guarantee the systems in operational condition in case of any emergency.

SFFECO specializes in the maintenance of Fire Protection Equipment and Systems, offering top-quality, customized services to meet our clients' requirements. Our team consists of highly experienced fire safety professionals with over 40 years of expertise in engineering and maintenance roles at major fire technical centers and stations across the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

We proudly serve both government and private sector clients, ensuring the highest standards of fire protection and detection maintenance.

Visit us at: www.sffeco.com
 #FireSafety #fire #fireextinguishingsystem

company_updates.reshared_post_description:
SFFECO designs and provides various types of gaseous fire extinguishing systems such as Clean Agent, CO2, Thermo-Act, Kitchen hood, Water Mist, etc. to our valued customers throughout the kingdom of Saudi Arabia as well as Gulf Region. 
Gaseous systems typically consist of the extinguishing agent, agent storage containers, agent release valves, fire detection system, agent delivery piping, and agent dispersion nozzles to make the system functioning effectively.

For Standard Fire Extinguishing Systems: https://lnkd.in/gNW-M3rt

For Certified Fire Extinguishing Systems: https://lnkd.in/eVRStBHi

https://lnkd.in/e9_7PJQ

#FireSafety #InnovationInSafety

ضمان سلامتك مع صيانة احترافية لطفايات الحريق!
 
في شركة SFFECO، نتخصص في تقديم خدمات صيانة موثوقة لطفايات الحريق للحفاظ على سلامة عملك ومنزلك وأحبائك. تعد الصيانة الدورية لطفايات الحريق أمرًا ضروريًا لضمان عملها بشكل صحيح في حالات الطوارئ. يقدم فريقنا من الفنيين المهرة عمليات فحص شاملة، وخدمات صيانة دورية، وإعادة تعبئة، وإصلاحات، مما يضمن أن طفايات الحريق الخاصة بك دائمًا في حالة مثالية.
مع عقود من الخبرة والتزامنا بالسلامة، نساعدك على الامتثال للوائح السلامة من الحرائق ونوفر لك راحة البال بمعرفة أن حماية الحريق الخاصة بك دائمًا جاهزة. سواء كنت بحاجة إلى خدمة لمرة واحدة أو خطة صيانة مخصصة، نحن هنا لدعمك.
 
 SFFECO تقدم خدمات صيانة وإعادة تعبئة طفايات الحريق بطرق مختلفة، مثل:
•            عقد صيانة سنوي (AMC)
•            الصيانة الفورية
•            عقد لمدة خمس سنوات
 SFFECO تقوم بصيانة الطفايات المحمولة / المتنقلة / النمطية مثل:
•            طفايات البودرة
•            طفايات ثاني أكسيد الكربون
•            طفايات الرغوة / الماء
•            طفايات الوكلاء النظيفين
•          طفايات المواد الكيميائية الرطبة

ENSURE YOUR SAFETY WITH PROFESSIONAL FIRE EXTINGUISHER MAINTENANCE!

At SFFECO we specialize in providing reliable fire extinguisher maintenance services to keep your business, home, and peoples safe. Regular maintenance of fire extinguishers is important to safeguard they function appropriately in an emergency. Our team of skilled technicians offers thorough inspections, regular servicing, refilling, and repairs, confirming that your fire extinguishers are always in optimal condition. With decades of experience and a commitment to safety, we help you stay compliant with fire safety regulations and give you peace of mind knowing your fire protection is always ready. Whether you need a one-time service or a customized maintenance plan, we are here to support you.

SFFECO Carrying out Fire& Safety Maintenance and Refilling of Fire Extinguishers in various modes, like:
AMC (Annual Maintenance Contract)
Immediate Maintenance
Five Year Contract

SFFECO do maintenance for Portable / Mobile / Modular Type of Extinguishers like:
Powder Extinguishers
CO2 Extinguishers
Foam / Water Extinguishers
Clean Agent Extinguishers
Wet Chemical Extinguishers

Visit: www.sffeco.com

خدمة طفايات الحريق المتنقلة
مركبة مدمجة لبيع وفحص وصيانة معداتمكافحة الحرائق

الهدف الأساسي من هذه المركبةالمتنقلة لخدمة طفايات الحريق هو ضمان جميع أجهزة ومعدات مكافحة الحرائق في حالةعمل سليمة. تم تصميم المركبة لحمل الأدوات وقطع الغيار والمعدات اللازمة لعملياتالفحص والإصلاح والصيانة.

تم تجهيز المركبة بمقصورات تخزينورفوف لتخزين الأدوات وقطع الغيار والمعدات المختلفة بشكل آمن. يضمن ذلك سهولةالوصول وتنظيمًا فعالًا لجميع العناصر اللازمة للفحص والصيانة.


Mobile Extinguisher Service

A COMPACT VEHICLE FOR FIRE EQUIPMENT SALES, INSPECTION AND MAINTENANCE

The primary purpose of this mobile fire extinguisher service vehicle is to ensure that all fire apparatus and equipment are in proper working condition. The vehicle is designed to carry the necessary tools, spare parts, and equipment required for inspections, repairs, and maintenance tasks.

The vehicle is equipped with storage compartments and racks to safely store various tools, spare parts, and equipment. This ensures easy access and efficient organization of all necessary items needed for inspections and maintenance.

Visit us: www.sffeco.com

ELEVATING EXCELLENCE: INTERNAL TRAINING FOR OUR SALES TEAM!

SFFECO is committed to empowering its sales force with the knowledge and skills they need to thrive. Recently, we conducted an engaging internal training session tailored to enhance:

PRODUCT KNOWLEDGE: Understanding the unique features and benefits of our offerings.
SALES STRATEGIES: Equipping the team with tools to better serve our customers.
CUSTOMER ENGAGEMENT: Focusing on building lasting relationships.

Such initiatives not only strengthen our team’s capabilities but also ensure we deliver the best experience to our clients.

Stay tuned as we continue to invest in our people and their growth!

مقطتفات من زيارة للمصنع! 

تشرفنا باستضافة استشاري و مقاول المشروع واستشاري الدفاع المدني في مصنعنا. 

م. ابراهيم منيسي
مكتب رمضان لاستشارات الامن والسلامة - استشاري الدفاع المدني

م. مجدي عبدالغني
مدير مكتب الاستشارات الهندسية - مكتب سليمان الخريجي

م. محمد ابو النجا
مدير المشاريع - شركة مستويات - ايلاف طيبة

م. محمد عزت
مدير المشاريع - شركة عهد الجزيرة

م. محمد الطيطي
مدير فرع المدينة المنورة - شركة المصنع السعودي لاجهزة الاطفاء – سفيكو


خلال زيارتهم، اطلعوا على:

 صالة عرض المصنع: عرض أحدث ابتكاراتنا ومنتجاتنا المميزة.
 خطوط الإنتاج: نظرة خلف الكواليس على عملياتنا التصنيعية الفعالة وعالية الجودة.
 مخزن المواد الخام: استعراض المواد الممتازة التي نستخدمها لضمان أعلى مستويات الجودة.

أكدت هذه الزيارة التزامنا بالشفافية والجودة والسلامة في كل جانب من جوانب عملياتنا.
نشكر زوارنا الكرام على وقتهم وملاحظاتهم القيمة. معاً، نواصل بناء التميز!
